statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE customer_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE id = 10 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%' AND date_received < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE username = 'admin' AND event_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_id = 10 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'DELETE' AND action_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM security_logs WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe')
